name: UIResponderStandardEditActions
desc: A set of standard methods that apps can adopt to support editing.

items.name: func cut(Any?)
items.desc: Removes the selected content and writes the data for it to the pasteboard.

items.name: func copy(Any?)
items.desc: Copies the selected content to the pasteboard.

items.name: func paste(Any?)
items.desc: Pastes the current contents of the pasteboard into your app's interface.

items.name: func delete(Any?)
items.desc: Removes the selected content from your interface.

items.name: func select(Any?)
items.desc: Selects the content in your responder.

items.name: func selectAll(Any?)
items.desc: Selects all of the content in the current responder.

items.name: func printContent(Any?)
items.desc: Tells your app to print available content.

items.name: func toggleBoldface(Any?)
items.desc: Toggles the bold style information of the selected text.

items.name: func toggleItalics(Any?)
items.desc: Toggles the italic style information of the selected text.

items.name: func toggleUnderline(Any?)
items.desc: Toggles the underline style information of the selected text.

items.name: func makeTextWritingDirectionLeftToRight(Any?)
items.desc: Change the writing direction to left-to-right.

items.name: func makeTextWritingDirectionRightToLeft(Any?)
items.desc: Change the writing direction to right-to-left.

items.name: func increaseSize(Any?)
items.desc: Increase the size of the current object by one unit.

items.name: func decreaseSize(Any?)
items.desc: Decrease the size of the current object by one unit.

items.name: func updateTextAttributes(conversionHandler: ([NSAttributedString.Key : Any]) -> [NSAttributedString.Key : Any])
items.desc: Tells your app to update the attributes of the currently selected text.
